        Determine if this is the first time the app has been launched and, if so, display a brief tutorial on how to use a particular feature of the app.
        Parameters:
        rootView - Root View.
        line - Currently-selected line.
        tutorial - Tutorial to display.
        shouldDisplay - Whether or not tutorial should display.

        Create a usable stop forecast with the data returned from the server.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
